item.title: Jan 2020: Our paper MKCT to appear at Neural Computing and Applications.
item.description:
Our paper Robust Multi-Kernelized Correlators for UAV Tracking with Adaptive Context Analysis and Dynamic Weighted Filters is accepted by the journal of Neural Computing and Applications!

It is my first time to publish a regular paper as the first student author. More details will be released soon!
